data: Slava Kokoouline Professor PSB 302 Viatcheslav.Kokoouline@ucf.edu 407-823-1543 Dr. Kokoouline received his Ph.D. in Physics from Université   de   Paris­Sud   XI,  Laboratoire   Aimé   Cotton,   France   and St.­Petersburg   State   University,  Institute   of   Physics,   Russia. He spent one year (1999-2000) as a post-doctoral associate in the Fritz Haber Research Center for Molecular Dynamics at the Hebrew University, Jerusalem, Israel. He spent two years (2000-2003) as a Research Associate in the Department of Physics at the University of Colorado, Boulder, CO before joining UCF in 2003 where he is a Professor. Université Paris XI, Orsay, France (1999). Available at http://www.physics.ucf.edu/~slavako/publ/these.pdf Joshua Forer Awards UCF Faculty Selected for APS Fellowship Physics professor Slava Kokoouline was elected to Fellow of the American Physical Society (APS) in November.  His fellowship was recommended by the Division of Atomic,…
